alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:17PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN KOOCHICHING COUNTY THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 417 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northwest of Nett Lake, or 27 miles south of International Falls, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Koochiching County, including the following locations... Bois Forte Band Nett Lake Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Heavy localized rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive through flood waters.
